name: PDQ.com's The Sneaker Net
description:
An uncomfortably frustrating IT simulator from PDQ.com, an IT sysadmin software company. Each year PDQ.com creates an homage to system administrators around the world. For 2020, we've released a full fledged video game.

How To Play

Extract the zip file, and run `PDQ.com's The Sneaker Net.exe` See this blog post for play-through instructions.
